Inventory - Class in <Unnamed>
Class to manage and alter all the informations for each individual item in the store inventory.
Inventory() - Constructor for class Inventory
Constructs an Inventory Object that initializes all variables with default values

Constructs an Inventory object that initializes all the values associated with it to the arguments passed to it.
itemSearch(ArrayList<Inventory>) - Static method in class Hardward_Store_Software_Part2
Checks through the inventory for any items that match the provided item or partial name to the item, and returns the current on-hands, prices, and ID number.
